rename.to: Poor thread utilization when using ExclusiveResource.GLOBAL_KEY

body: Thanks for the reproducer! Any ideas for optimizing this? Scheduling `@Isolated` tests to run last? /cc @leonard84

I am thinking that if a thread can not aquire the read-write locks it needs, it could start work stealing and speed up the parallel sections that are able to run.

https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/java/util/concurrent/ForkJoinTask.html#helpQuiesce--

I've never used this before, so I'm not sure how performant it would be.

issue.title: Run isolated tasks last

repository.name: junit-framework
repository.description: âœ… The programmer-friendly testing framework for Java and the JVM

issue.body:
- **Fix/suppress warnings**
- **Add failing test case**
- **Run isolated tasks after all other tasks**
- **Add to release notes**

Resolves #3928.
